speaker: Rachel
text: Has the changelog been written yet?
ipa: hæz ðə ˈʧeɪndʒlɔːɡ bɪn ˈrɪtən jɛt?

speaker: Tariq
text: Yes, it was finalized this morning. All the new features are listed with brief descriptions.
ipa: jɛs, ɪt wəz ˈfaɪnəlaɪzd ðɪs ˈmɔːnɪŋ. ɔːl ðə njuː ˈfiːʧəz ə ˈlɪstɪd wɪð briːf dɪˈskrɪpʃənz.

speaker: Rachel
text: Perfect. And has the security team been informed about the patch to the authentication module?
ipa: ˈpɜːfɪkt. ənd hæz ðə sɪˈkjʊərɪti tiːm bɪn ɪnˈfɔːmd əˈbaʊt ðə pæʧ tuː ði ɔːˌθɛntɪˈkeɪʃən ˈmɒdjuːl?

speaker: Tariq
text: They have. The update was reviewed last week, and no vulnerabilities were found.
ipa: ðeɪ hæv. ði ˈʌpdeɪt wəz rɪˈvjuːd lɑːst wiːk, ənd nəʊ ˌvʌlnərəˈbɪlɪtiz wə faʊnd.

speaker: Rachel
text: Great. Has legal been consulted about the new data handling flow?
ipa: ɡreɪt. hæz ˈliːɡəl bɪn kənˈsʌltɪd əˈbaʊt ðə njuː ˈdeɪtə ˈhændlɪŋ fləʊ?

speaker: Tariq
text: Yep. A compliance note was added to the release package, and it has been approved.
ipa: jɛp. ə kəmˈplaɪəns nəʊt wəz ˈædɪd tuː ðə rɪˈliːs ˈpækɪdʒ, ənd ɪt hæz bɪn əˈpruːvd.

speaker: Rachel
text: Were any clients contacted about the downtime?
ipa: wə ˈɛni ˈklaɪənts ˈkɒntæktɪd əˈbaʊt ðə ˈdaʊntaɪm?

speaker: Tariq
text: Yes, premium clients were notified by account managers. The rest will be alerted via status page updates.
ipa: jɛs, ˈpriːmiəm ˈklaɪənts wə ˈnəʊtɪfaɪd baɪ əˈkaʊnt ˈmænɪdʒəz. ðə rɛst wɪl bi əˈlɜːtɪd ˈvaɪə ˈsteɪtəs peɪdʒ ˈʌpdeɪts.

speaker: Rachel
text: Awesome. Just make sure the rollback script is tested again — we can’t take risks at this stage.
ipa: ˈɔːsəm. dʒəst meɪk ʃʊə ðə ˈrəʊlbæk skrɪpt ɪz ˈtɛstɪd əˈɡɛn — wi kɑːnt teɪk rɪsks æt ðɪs steɪdʒ.

speaker: Tariq
text: Already done. It was executed in staging twice. Everything went smoothly.
ipa: ɔːlˈrɛdi dʌn. ɪt wəz ˈɛksɪkjuːtɪd ɪn ˈsteɪdʒɪŋ twaɪs. ˈɛvrɪθɪŋ wɛnt ˈsmuːðli.

speaker: Rachel
text: Then it looks like we’re ready. Let’s get this shipped.
ipa: ðɛn ɪt lʊks laɪk wɪə ˈrɛdi. lɛts ɡɛt ðɪs ʃɪpt.
